description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-34142
EML to MHTML: Korean characters in subject replaced "?"
NETWORKNET-34205
Accents converted to special characters, while converting from EML to MSG
NETWORKNET-34213
Wrong start and end time read for MapiCalendar
NETWORKNET-34215
MailMessage identifies HTML message body as Plain Text
NETWORKNET-34222
Email message headers rendered to output MHT
NETWORKNET-34211
Inline images not read by MailMessage
NETWORKNET-34212
Attachment Names not shown properly
NETWORKNET-34218
Body information for Read Receipt message can not be read
NETWORKNET-34231
MSG Files using Aspose.Email can't be sent from Outlook
NETWORKNET-34207
MapiMessage.BodyHtml gives ArgumentException
NETWORKNET-34221
EML to MSG raises System.FormatException
NETWORKNET-34232
MSG to TIFF raises System.InvalidOperationException
NETWORKNET-34225
Exception while converting EML loaded in MailMessage to MapiMessage (.NET)
NETWORKNET-34217
Exception: 'x-gbk' is not a supported encoding name

Enhancements
NETWORKNET-34230
Improvement semi-corrupt PST reading

New Features
NETWORKNET-29010
Add the support of working via proxi in mail clients
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
